A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The Force Awakens was a safe ripoff of A New Hope.  I was able to forgive Han's demise because that's probably what Harrison would have preferred and at lease his character went down as a hero.  

The Last Jedi goes out of its way to screw everything that came before it.  It's so bad that I can't even enjoy the original trilogy anymore.  Thanks for taking that away from me.

Congratulations\, Ruin
